channel.title: Creating Functions :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: While using the functions built into JavaScript is useful, the most powerful aspect of functions is the ability of programmers to create their own. There are several ways to define functions in JavaScript. We will introduce one technique in this chapter and a second technique in the next. Function Syntax To create a function, use the following syntax: function myFunction(parameter1, parameter2,..., parameterN) { // function body }
